Evocation 4

Scorching Wind

EA Ubar,  MA Na'Ba

Set Effect Value (1) if lower:Desiccation
 
(Heat/Fire [fire], Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
The Scorching Wind is the primordial wind from which the Hinn were spawned. It is unbearably dry and hot and will dehydrate living beings within minutes. The spell has no effect on living beings resistant to heat or with wasteland survival abilities.
Affected units get 2d8 fatigue dmg each turn. MR +DRN vs 22 negates the effect.
